name: Teleport Platforms (Artifact)
description: A pair of self-powered, metallic, grav platforms. Each has four handles around its circular rim and floats at a height of about 50 centimeters. They can be controlled by pulling or pushing and will carry up to 600 kilograms without effort (they resist gravity; inertia still resists to movement).

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
